description: An in-depth investigation of a selected topic through readings, bibliography, reports and projects. May be repeated if topic is different. Prerequisite: THEAT 110 or THEAT 180; some topics courses may require additional prerequisites.
name: Top: Adv Design for Performance
prerequisites: THEAT 110 or THEAT 180; some topics courses may require additional prerequisites.

revisions.name: Top:
notes: This course studies and analyzes the concepts, principles and techniques of
doing visual design for live performance and extends the techniques and
experiences of design for each student. Students engage in design project work
in specific areas of interest relating to live performance.

title: Topics in Interpretation and Theater
